name: 狄雅南
objective: This course will give a student with a basic background and understanding of general health and safety practices and the control measures required to reduce risks in the workplace.
schedule:
1st week : Introduction to laboratory safety and health 
2nd week: Hazard Communication and MSDS 
3rd week : Fire and Explosion  
4th week : Chemical Hazards  
5th week : Biological Hazards 
6th week : Chemical Reaction Hazards 
7th week : Electrical Safety 
8th week : Respiratory Protection 
9th week : Noise Hazard 
10th week: Personal Protective Equipment 
11th week: Confined Space Safety
12th week: Study Safety Cases in Industrial Processes
13th week: Review
14th week: Group Presentation
15th week: Group Presentation
16th week: Group Presentation
17th week: Group Presentation
18th week: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Short Quiz                                                       15%
Group presentation　　        　　　　　　　　20 %
Final Exam 　　　　　　　　　　　　　　45 %
Classroom participants (Q&A)　　                20 %
materials:
1. Daniel A. C./Joseph F. L., Chemical Process Safety, 2nded., Prentice Hall (2002). 
2. OHSAS 18001 Occupational Health & Safety Guide
remarks:
本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
